Data.//: Pocket Fee - A fee that's paid outside the parameters of the loan
Data.//_: If a fee is neither financed nor APR affecting, that fee is paid
Data.//-: outside the scope of the FedBox and is referred to as an 'Out of
Data.//!: Pocket Fee' or simply a 'Pocket Fee'. An example of a fee like
Data.//|: this would be a single premium insurance product that is paid out
Data.//@: Some reasons these fees may want to be included in the formal loan numbers:
Data.//#: o The fee is computed on a loan figure, such as the Principal balance
Data.//$: o All fees applying to the loan keep together for organization and disclosure
Data.//%: The sample fee is an insurance premium paid out of pocket (not
